SEARCH
Package trellolite.model

Class Workspace

java.lang.Object
trellolite.model.Workspace
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Workspace extends Object implements Serializable
Board class This class represents a board in the Trello-Lite application. A board is a collection of lists. A board has a name and a unique id. A board can be serialized and deserialized. A board can be created with a name or without a name. If a board is created without a name, a default name is given. The default name is "Board" + id. The id is automatically generated.
The methods of this class are:
  • addList
  • removeList
  • getList
  • getLists
Author:
Pierre Fromont Boissel, Augustin

  • Constructor Details

    • Workspace

      public Workspace(String name, Participant creator)
      This constructor creates a workspace with the given name. The workspace is created with the given creator as a member and with one board.
      Parameters:
      name - String, this is the name of the workspace.
      creator - Participant, this is the creator of the workspace.
